title: Fear and Global Warming in Las Vegas
author: VD
content_html:
Temperatures have risen 9/10ths of one percent in Las Vegas since the 1960s! However, they have fallen 1.8 percent since the 1940s, 2.7 percent at their nadir.

Always check the numbers….
content_text:
Temperatures have risen 9/10ths of one percent in Las Vegas since the 1960s!  However, they have fallen 1.8 percent since the 1940s,
2.7 percent at their nadir
.
